assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Gati Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides distribution and supply chain solutions in India and internationally. The company operates through two segments, Express Distribution and Fuel Stations. It offers road, rail, and air transportation services; express distribution services; managed, re-engineering, upstream supply chain management, and warehousing services; cargo management and parcel train services; and e-commerce logistic solutions. The company also provides air and ocean freight forwarding services, as well as related freight management solutions; road and air movement to SAARC nations; warehousing solutions; customs clearance services; project logistics; and in-bound and out-bound courier services. In addition, it provides truck load services for long haul transportation; reefer fleet services for the food chain business; customized cold chain solutions; and organized retail services. Further, the company offers customs clearance, goods importation, and last-mile delivery services to the end-customer; and GST solutions to address regulations, place-of-supply rules, tax impact assessments, accounting and technology, input credit setoffs, vendor rationalizations, and management, as well as operates fuel stations, which deals in petrol, diesel, lubricants, etc. It serves the e-commerce, hospitality, healthcare, and electronics sectors. Gati Limited was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Hyderabad, India.

companyOfficers.name: Ms. T. S. Maharani
companyOfficers.title: Company Sec. and Chief Investor Relations & Compliance Officer

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Pavel  Chopra
companyOfficers.title: Chief Group Human Resource and BSG & Vigilance Officer
